function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey instrument questions related to outdoor recreational park use and factors affecting use.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of park use dynamics during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Include questions that specifically address the impact of the pandemic on park use.","Technologies":"Survey design and data analysis techniques focused on pandemic-related changes.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, and park management stakeholders.","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations, local government."},{"Description":"Limited availability of other recreational facilities due to pandemic restrictions.","Impact":"Potential concentration of park use leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to manage park capacity and promote alternative outdoor recreation options.","Technologies":"Park management and monitoring systems, communication and public awareness campaigns.","People":"Park managers, public health officials, and park users.","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations, park management stakeholders."},{"Description":"Demographic information collection including gender and age.","Impact":"Potential for demographic disparities in park use and COVID-19 risk exposure.","Mitigation":"Collect additional demographic data related to socioeconomic status, household size, and employment status.","Technologies":"Survey design and data collection tools for demographic information.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, and community organizations.","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations, local government."}]}
